body.p: This section contains licensing information for some third-party components that are used by Couchbase Server. We are thankful to all individuals that have created these third-party components.
IMPORTANT: The complete list of licenses for Couchbase Server is available on the Legal Agreements page.

section.title: PCRE LICENCE
section.p: PCRE is a library of functions to support regular expressions whose syntax and semantics are as close as possible to those of the Perl 5 language.
Regular expression support is provided by the PCRE library package, which is open source software, written by Philip Hazel, and copyright by the University of Cambridge, England.
